item.title: Istanbul rocked by 6.2-magnitude earthquake
item.description: People could be seen fleeing from buildings as the quake rocked the Turkish city.

item.title: Top US officials pull out of Russia-Ukraine ceasefire talks in London
item.description: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio and special envoy Steve Witkoff are no longer attending the talks.

item.title: Remains found after rare shark attack on swimmer in Israel
item.description: Footage posted online shows a swimmer flailing in the distance as beachgoers yell in shock.

item.title: Nine killed in Russian attack on Ukraine bus
item.description: At least 30 were injured in the city of Marhanets in central-south Ukraine.

item.title: Mourners visit Pope Francis lying in state at St Peter's Basilica
item.description: The body of the pontiff, who died on Monday, has been moved into the church for a period of public mourning.
